verses.verse: For, behold, the day<WH3117> cometh<WH935>, that shall burn<WH1197> as an oven<WH8574>; and all the proud<WH2086>, yea, and all that do<WH6213> wickedly<WH7564>, shall be stubble<WH7179>: and the day<WH3117> that cometh<WH935> shall burn them up<WH3857>, saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, that it shall leave<WH5800> them neither root<WH8328> nor branch<WH6057>.
